DOC.HEADLINE: EAST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : SIMI VALLEY ; VOLUNTEERS SOUGHT TO HELP QUAKE VICTIMS
DOC.TEXT: As part of an ongoing effort to help victims of the Jan . 17 earthquake , a nonprofit organization that provides housing for low-income families is seeking volunteers in Simi Valley . Habitat for Humanity of Ventura County will hold a special joint meeting with Simi Valley ' s four neighborhood councils to recruit volunteers and drum_up support for earthquake repair efforts . No special skills are needed to volunteer . The meeting will be at 7 p.m. today at Simi Valley City_Hall at 2929 Tapo Canyon Road . For more information , call Randi Joseph at 583-6756 . SARA CATANIA
